acupuncture.name: Acupuncture
acupuncture.description: Support your wellness journey with traditional acupuncture techniques designed to promote relaxation and balance.

chiropractic.name: Chiropractic Care
chiropractic.description: Gentle chiropractic adjustments to help alleviate pregnancy-related discomfort and support natural alignment.

overnightDoula.name: Overnight Doula Care
overnightDoula.description: Receive additional support during overnight hours to help you rest and recover while ensuring your baby's needs are met.

prenatalMassage.name: Prenatal Massage
prenatalMassage.description: Specialized massage therapy tailored for expectant mothers to reduce tension and promote relaxation.

postpartumMassage.name: Postpartum Massage
postpartumMassage.description: Therapeutic massage designed to support your body's recovery after birth and ease muscle tension.

pelvicFloorTherapy.name: Pelvic Floor Therapy
pelvicFloorTherapy.description: Specialized support for pelvic health through gentle exercises to strengthen and restore function.
